dt.t: promised his dying mother that he would always take care of his {it}sweet{/it} sister
breathed in the {it}sweet{/it} air of the azalea garden

dt: having an easygoing and pleasing manner especially in social situations

dt.t: a very {it}sweet{/it} man directed us to the lost and found

dt: having qualities that tend to make one loved
giving pleasure or contentment to the mind or senses

dt.t: the glowing reviews of his novel were the {it}sweetest{/it} things the writer had ever read

shortdef: having an easygoing and pleasing manner especially in social situations

dt: a food having a high sugar content

dt.t: remember to brush your teeth after eating {it}sweets{/it}

dt: a person with whom one is in love

dt.t: my darling, my {it}sweet{/it}, won't you be mine?

shortdef: a food having a high sugar content
a person with whom one is in love

dt: to get (someone) to do something by gentle urging, special attention, or flattery

dt.t: she can {it}sweet-talk{/it} her besotted boyfriend into just about anything

shortdef: to get (someone) to do something by gentle urging, special attention, or flattery

dt.t: enough of this {it}sweet talk{/it}—just give me your honest opinion of my performance

dt: filled with an intense or excessive love for

dt.t: That girl's {it}sweet on{/it} you and I think you should ask her out!

shortdef: filled with an intense or excessive love for
